summary: A composable pipeline that holds a collection of callable transforms and, on each invocation, randomly selects a subset of them to apply. The subset size can be fixed or drawn from a range, sampling may be weighted or uniform, and replacement is optional. The component also supports lazy execution, perâ€‘item mapping for iterable inputs, argument unpacking, configurable logging, and runtime parameter overrides.
business_intent: Enable flexible, stochastic data augmentation and preprocessing in machine learning workflows, providing varied transformations per sample to improve model robustness and generalization.
